title: Remove the wave clear from ADC itemization
body:
It's getting ridiculous

People hate that Ziggs can stall games with his yet adcs can now do it more reliably than Zigss

Any adc that has any of these items {{item:3087}} {{item:3094}} can pretty much 1-2 shot a oncoming minion wave

Lets not forget ADC who can stack on this annoying itemization with their ability to stall {{champion:51}} {{champion:498}} 

I don't mind a champion who has designed wave clear in their kit and using it like {{champion:15}} to wave clear. But automatic wave clear from items that still make you god-like late game is idiotic. Stop giving one role so much power.
